comments: Giles III (SAC) makes marginal contact to the body of Knight (DET) during the drive.
Wood (DET) is in the lane for longer than three seconds.
Bogdanovic (SAC) makes marginal contact with Knight (DET) with his off-arm and does not dislodge him from his defensive position.
Knight's (DET) arms are not in a perfectly vertical position, but the contact to Bogdanovic's (SAC) non-shooting arm is marginal as he retreats them to a vertical position.
Bogdanovic (SAC) reaches in and makes marginal contact with Knight (DET).  Knight's reaction is not consistent with the level of contact.
Bogdanovic (SAC) makes marginal contact with Wood (DET) that does not affect his play at the basket.
Galloway (DET) makes marginal contact to the body of Fox (SAC) as he gathers and enters his shooting motion.
Mykhailiuk (DET) makes marginal contact with Fox (SAC) as he reaches in during his drive.
Galloway (DET) maintains a legal guarding position during the jump shot attempt by Fox (SAC).
During the screen, Barnes (SAC) places two hands on Snell (DET) and the contact affects his FOM.
Wood (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Fox (SAC) and firms up upon contact.
Giles (SAC) trips Knight (DET) and causes him to fall to the floor.
Thomas (DET) commits a take foul on Hield (SAC).
